Projects.Name_of_Project: PREACH Application – Multimodal Inputs (Video/Audio/Text) to PowerPoint Presentations
Projects.Description:
Utilized LLMs, NLP, and CV techniques to convert video/audio/text inputs into PowerPoint presentations, offering a 30% more interactive and engaging presentation experience.
- Won 1st place and 350$ prize money at Intel oneAPI Hackathon 2024.

Projects.Name_of_Project: mysticML Library Development – Python Library for Automated Data Preprocessing
Projects.Description:
Converts raw data into preprocessed data according to the dataset automatically, accelerating the execution time of the ML pipeline by 30%.
- Demonstrated a 40% improvement in overall efficiency over existing preprocessing methods, paving the way for more accurate and streamlined data analysis.

Projects.Name_of_Project: Traffic Flow Optimization Solution – Dynamic Approach to Optimizing Traffic at Crossroads
Projects.Description:
Engineered a dynamic approach using YOLO v8 to alleviate traffic congestion at crossroads, based on one year of intensive research, resulting in a 15% increase in traffic flow efficiency.
- Presented a 35% reduction in average wait times using a custom objective function and novel optimization strategy, providing a scalable solution for urban traffic management.

Projects.Name_of_Project: Early Disease Detection & Monitoring Application – Serving the rural population
Projects.Description:
Part of the National Health Mission, Govt. of India's funded initiative to create an application for disease monitoring in rural areas.
- Expected to yield an 80% increase in early detection rates for diabetes and hypertension diseases, addressing healthcare disparities in underserved communities.

Projects.Name_of_Project: Nobel Laureate Classification – Efficient Methodology for Image Classification
Projects.Description:
Proposed an efficient methodology for image classification at the IEEE flagship conference, offering a 40% time-efficient solution.
- Demonstrated a 70% reduction in computational resources while maintaining high accuracy levels, setting a new standard for image analysis algorithms.

Projects.Name_of_Project: Scan2Read Application – Enhancing Accessibility for the Visually Impaired
Projects.Description:
Developed a Kivi application leveraging OCR and text-to-speech techniques exclusively for blind people to make them aware of their surroundings, providing 15% more effective awareness while navigating. 
- Won 2nd place and 5000 INR prize money at Shells SJC Hackathon 2024.

Achievements.Heading: IEEE RAICS 2024 Presenter
Achievements.Description: Novel efficient methodology for Image Classification was presented by my team in this flagship conference on 17th of May at MACE, Kerala.

Achievements.Heading: Intel oneAPI Hackathon 2024 Winner
Achievements.Description: Secured victory among 190 competitors, engineering a groundbreaking application, reached 90% efficiency with it, earned a $350 prize, and nationwide recognition.

Achievements.Heading: Shells KJC Hackathon 2024 Runner-up
Achievements.Description: Achieved 92% accuracy with Scan2read, awarded INR 5000; idea acquired by sponsoring company.

Achievements.Heading: Achieved Perfect GPA
Achievements.Description: Earned perfect GPA of 4.0 in the first trimester of 2023-2024 academic year, constituting of Mathematics, Statistics, AI Basics, Machine Learning and Databases.
